abstract: NBA Roundup; Cleveland Cavaliers defeat Brooklyn Nets, 90-88; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Nets slipped to 1-10 on the road with the loss in Cleveland.

headline.main: Late Shot by James Pushes Cavs Past Nets
headline.print_headline: Late Shot by James Pushes Cavs Past Nets

snippet: The Nets slipped to 1-10 on the road with the loss in Cleveland.
